title: Queensland real estate agents prepare for Anzac Day trading shutdown
desc: With Anzac Day falling on a Saturday this year, trading restrictions mean open houses and auctions will need to be rescheduled.

title: Not for those who abuse PM Modi: Ex-BJP MP refuses blankets to Muslims
desc: Ex-BJP MP Sukhbir Singh Jaunapuria also expressed displeasure towards his supporters for gathering people from the Muslim community for a charitable drive. When a villager objected to the BJP leader's behaviour, the latter asserted that the drive was not part of a government initiative and was sponsored by him in his personal capacity.

title: Cbf Demands “Exemplary Punishment” for Prestianni Following Vinícius Incident
desc: Exemplary punishment on the way? The CBF refuses to stand by, demanding a deep-dive investigation from FIFA and UEFA following the alleged racial slurs by Prestianni against Vinícius Jr. in Lisbon. Brazilian football is calling for a definitive turning point.

title: Alan Cumming Apologizes At BAFTA Film Awards For Tourette’s Swearing
desc: Alan Cumming briefly halted the BAFTA Film Awards to thank the audience for their understanding amid interruptions from nominee with Tourette’s.

title: Swimmer Strikes Again: 900-year-old Crusader Sword Found Off Israel's Coast
desc: The Amateur Swimmer Found the Sword on the Seabed Off a Northern Israeli Beach. Tests on the Sword Found That It Likely Belonged to a 12th-century Crusader Warrior Who Brought It From Europe

title: Indian movie ‘Boong’ bags BAFTA award for Best Children’s & Family Film
desc: Indian film ‘Boong’ wins BAFTA for Best Children’s & Family Film, directed by Lakshmipriya Devi and backed by Farhan Akhtar.

title: The New African Scramble: Contracts, Not Colonies
desc: Africa critical minerals drive a new scramble via supply chain contracts, not colonialism, as nations seek cobalt, lithium, and platinum leverage.

title: Arsenal answer title pressure with resounding derby win at Spurs
desc: Despite the growing pressure in the title race, Mikel Arteta's team responded with character to claim a 4-1 victory over their local rivals and deliver a message to their critics.

title: Winter Olympics 2026: Sidney Crosby reflects on "tough" decision to sit out Olympic final after loss to USA
desc: The two-time Olympic champion recounted following the Canada-USA final from a training room in the arena and the thought process behind deciding to sit out what is likely to be his career's last Olympic match.

title: With gold medal around his neck, Canadian skip Jacobs has a message for the haters
desc: Canada's Brad Jacobs addresses social media backlash against teammate Marc Kennedy during a press conference following their gold medal win in men's curling.
